abstract: Stephen Ketchum, head of media investment-banking, is the latest person to leave Bank of America. Mr. Ketchum will be succeeded on an interim basis by Rick Swift, who retains his role as global head of telecommunications, The Charlotte Business Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Ketchum, head of media investment-banking, is the latest person to leave Bank of America. Mr. Ketchum will be succeeded on an interim basis by Rick Swift, who retains his role as global head of telecommunications, The Charlotte Business Journal reported.

headline.main: Media Banking Head is Latest BofA Casualty

abstract: Two weeks after Bank of America, Citigroup, JP Morgan and Wachovia pledged their support for the Master Liquidity Enhancement Conduit, intended to take the sting out of the recent liquidity squeeze, other banks have chosen to look the other way.
lead_paragraph: Two weeks after Bank of America, Citigroup, JP Morgan and Wachovia pledged their support for the Master Liquidity Enhancement Conduit, intended to take the sting out of the recent liquidity squeeze, other banks have chosen to look the other way.

headline.main: Super Conduit Leaves Many Banks Cold
